reporting-org.narrative: Bundesministerium für wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung (BMZ)
Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development (BMZ)

title.narrative: Deutscher Beitrag zum Nordic Trust Fund on Human Rights (NTF), Phase 2, freiwillige Zahlung
German Support to the Nordic Trust Fund on Human Rights (NTF)

description.narrative: Ausbau d. Wissensstands der WB-Mitarbeiter(innen) zum Menschenrechtsansatz in der E-Zusammenarb. und zur Gestaltung menschenrechtsbasierter Programmarbeit. Verbesserung der Voraussetzungen für die Verankerung des Menschrechtsansatzes in der operativen Arbeit der Weltbank

The NTF will support projects and workshops to explore ways in which a human rights-based approach (HRBA) to development policy and poverty reduction can make World Bank Group analysis and operations more effective in accordance with the human rights priorities and obligations of partner countries. The major goal of the German support to thwe NTF is a better integration of a HRBA in World Bank

The NTF will support projects and workshops to explore ways in which a human rights-based approach (HRBA) to development policy and poverty reduction can make World Bank Group analysis and operations more effective in accordance with the human rights priorities and obligations of partner countries. The major goal of the German support to thwe NTF is a better integration of a HRBA in World Bank
